name: Battle of Earth. Space Wars - Galaxy Starfighter Combat Flight Simulator
name_original: Battle of Earth. Space Wars - Galaxy Starfighter Combat Flight Simulator
description:
JOIN THE SPACE WARS!

Prepare to climb into the cockpit of a starfighter and take over the galaxy with the "Battle of Earth. Space Wars"

More than just a basic space shooter, Space Wars is a 3D simulator for budding star pilots everywhere!

" Battle of Earth. Space Wars " is powered by Unreal Engine technology. By using Epic Games' award-winning, most advanced game engine, our Combat Flight Simulator brings in the game such incredible detailed graphics, real-time lighting with a unique physics and weapon system that has not been here yet. You will not believe it's only a game for mobile devices!

FORGET EVERYTHING ELSE! THIS IS THE ULTIMATE SPACE COMBAT GAME!
With an extensive single player missions and the non-stop action will keep you at the edge of your seat!

Become the supreme lord of the skies!

CONSOLE QUALITY GAMING AND IT’S ONLY ON iOS!
Unparalleled visuals, special effects and audio including: specular masks, normal mapping, bump mapping, atmospheric scattering, realistic lighting, sun glare, high definition textures, 4x anisotropic filtering, HDR rendering, radial blur and more!

OPTIMIZED ON THE NEW iPAD AIR 2 AND iPHONE 6
Optimized for iPhone 6 and iPad Air 2 with the new A8 processors with greater environmental detail, spectacular visual effects and unparalleled performance!

RESTRICTIONS
Due to the high quality graphics and demanding real-time physics calculations this game is not recommended for older devices including the iPhone 3GS, iPod Touch 1 and iPad 1
